Kangto

Korean: 강토

Country:

South Korea

Birthday:
Dec 2, 1993
Age:
31 years old
Group (2016-present):
Se So Neon until Dec 31, 2018

Introduction

Kangto is a South Korean drummer. He was a member of the co-ed group Se So Neon. He left the group in December 2018 to enlist for military service.
